faqs.title: Services offered
faqs.answer: We offer screen printing, embroidery, DTF transfers, and personalization such as names and numbers.

faqs.title: Hours
faqs.answer: Our business hours are Monday through Friday, 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM.

faqs.title: Location / pickup address
faqs.answer: Our shop is located at 624 W Broadway Rd, Unit 220, Mesa, AZ 85210.

faqs.title: Contact
faqs.answer: You can reach us at info@sportswearexpress.com or by phone at (480) 507-0786.

faqs.title: Minimum order
faqs.answer: For screen printing, the minimum order is 48 pieces. There is no minimum for embroidery. For transfers, the minimum is $10 worth of film.

faqs.title: Methods explained (screen vs embroidery vs DTF)
faqs.answer: Screen printing is great for bold designs and larger runs, embroidery adds a premium stitched look, and DTF transfers are ideal for full‑color or smaller orders.

faqs.title: What products you decorate
faqs.answer: We decorate t‑shirts, jerseys, hoodies, fleece, sweatshirts, polos, jackets, hats, tote bags, and more.

faqs.title: Provide own garments
faqs.answer: Yes — you can bring your own garments or even ship them directly to us.

faqs.title: Catalog / brands carried
faqs.answer: We carry popular brands like Gildan, Bella+Canvas, Next Level, Sport‑Tek, Port Authority, Jerzees, and more.

faqs.title: Samples / proofs
faqs.answer: Every order includes a digital mockup for your review — you can approve it or request changes before production.

faqs.title: Design help
faqs.answer: Yes — our design team can create custom artwork or enhance your existing design.

faqs.title: Color limits (screen print)
faqs.answer: We can print up to 12 colors per location for screen printing.

faqs.title: Artwork file types
faqs.answer: We accept AI, PDF, EPS, SVG, PNG, and high‑resolution JPEG files.

faqs.title: Setup / digitizing fees
faqs.answer: Screen printing setup fees are included. Embroidery requires a one‑time digitizing fee based on stitch count. Art services are billed at $75 per hour.

faqs.title: Requesting a quote + what info you need
faqs.answer: To get a quote, we’ll need your design, garment type, quantity, and print locations. I can help you start that process now, or you can visit our quote page to submit your details.

faqs.title: Rush orders & changes
faqs.answer: Rush orders may be available depending on our schedule. Contact a team member to check availability and secure your spot.

faqs.title: Bulk discounts
faqs.answer: All screen printing and embroidery use tier‑based pricing — the more you order, the lower your per‑piece cost. Resellers can contact us for contract printing rates.

faqs.title: Turnaround time
faqs.answer: Typical turnaround is 5–10 business days after artwork approval, depending on our production schedule and your due date.

faqs.title: Payment methods / deposits / terms / tax / shipping in quote / price match
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards, checks, and cash.

faqs.title: Pickup vs shipping / carriers / tracking / transit time / domestic-international
faqs.answer: You can pick up your order in person or have it shipped. We work with all major carriers, including UPS, USPS, and FedEx.

faqs.title: Guarantee / misprints / returns
faqs.answer: [Placeholder — update with final guarantee and return policy wording.]

faqs.title: Artwork services & digitizing prices
faqs.answer: Art services are billed at $75 per hour. Digitizing fees depend on logo size and stitch count. We can modify existing designs or create new ones from your ideas.

faqs.title: Tech specs (max print area, smallest embroidery text, specialty inks)
faqs.answer: Specialty inks like metallic, reflective, and puff are available — contact a team member for details. Maximum screen print area is 14 inches wide by 16 inches tall.

faqs.title: Personalization, mixing sizes/styles, special orders, fulfillment, store integrations
faqs.answer: We offer jersey naming and numbering, as well as options for mixing sizes and styles within your order.

faqs._comment: NEW: Where to send files so artwork branch can land here

faqs.title: Where to send files
faqs.answer: Please email files to art@sportswearexpress.com or share a link via Google Drive, Dropbox, or WeTransfer.

options.answer: Yes — our design team can create custom artwork or enhance your existing design.
